text: Sirius XM Holdings Inc. is an American broadcasting company. It uses satellite radio and online radio to broadcast in the United States. The company was made in 2008. It was made because Sirius Satellite Radio and XM Satellite Radio merged into one company. Sirius XM is the largest music company in North America. Sirius XM has many different radio channels. One of its most popular channels is SiriusXM Hits 1. In 2018, Sirius Xm bought Pandora. Pandora is a music streaming company. As of 2016, the company has surpassed 30 million subscribers. == References == Category:Radio Category:Media in the United States
